document_data.caption: A map showing the Jade Jug on Waterdeep Way.
document_data.name: Jade Jug
document_data.mainbody: The '''Jade Jug''' was an [[inn]] located in [[Waterdeep]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The inn stood four stories tall.
document_data.Location: The Jade Jug was located in the far southeast section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Castle Ward|Castle Ward]] on the northwest corner of the intersection of [[Waterdeep Way]] and the [[High Road (Waterdeep)|High Road]]. The rear of the inn sat on [[the Cat's Tail]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Volo 5262}}
